results.name: The End of the Sun: Prologue

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 975 / Intel Core i5-750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon HD 7970 / (2GB VRAM minimum / 4GB VRAM recommended)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphic Preset: Low / Resolution: 1080p / Target FPS: 30 / SSD recommended / (NOTE: The initial graphics preset is set to 'Highest' and is not automatically adjusted based on hardware. For minimal requirements, we recommend changing the graphics preset in the main menu before starting a new game.)
